definition: to smash/to pound/to fail/to muck up/to bungle
to be willing to sacrifice everything one has (idiom)

sentences.english: Don't worry, I will get you the education fee by hook or crook.
sentences.chinese: 不要擔心，我就是砸鍋賣鐵，也要給你籌到學費。

sentences.english: " Cooking the books and paper" than" bungled ironmaking" better.
sentences.chinese: 而且“煮書造紙”比“砸鍋鍊鐵”還要高明。
